feedback.Physical Object: Included — A discrete, bounded physical structure within the human body.
feedback.Biological/Biomimetic: Included — Composed of living tissue with direct biological origin.
feedback.Powered: Excluded — Does not rely on supplied energy to operate.
feedback.Structural: Included — Major load-bearing bone crucial for physical stability and locomotion.
feedback.Observable: Included — Detectable via visual, tactile, and medical means (e.g. X-ray).
feedback.Physical Medium: Included — Composed of calcified biological matter; has substance.
feedback.Active: Excluded — Does not self-initiate behavior or change.
feedback.Intentionally Designed: Excluded — Not designed with purpose; shaped by biological development.
feedback.Outputs Effect: Excluded — Does not emit signal, energy, or functional output.
feedback.Processes Signals/Logic: Excluded — No informational or control function.
feedback.State-Transforming: Excluded — Not stateful or self-transforming in any functional sense.
feedback.Human-Interactive: Excluded — Not designed for manipulation or interaction.
feedback.System-integrated: Excluded — While it is part of the body, the femur is not an engineered subsystem.
feedback.System-Essential: Excluded — A body can technically survive or function without it (prosthetics, etc).
feedback.Symbolic: Excluded — Not intended to represent ideas or categories.
feedback.Signalling: Excluded — No signaling or communicative function.
feedback.Rule-governed: Excluded — Not structured or constrained by abstract rules.
feedback.Compositional: Excluded — Not made of logical or modular subcomponents.
feedback.Normative: Excluded — Does not guide or enforce behavior.
feedback.Digital/Virtual: Excluded — Entirely physical, not virtual or encoded.
feedback.Social Construct: Excluded — Exists regardless of social interpretation.
feedback.Institutionally Defined: Excluded — Not defined by a group or authority.
feedback.Identity-Linked: Excluded — Not inherently tied to role, group, or social identity.
feedback.Regulated: Excluded — Not subject to legal or policy constraints in itself.
feedback.Economically Significant: Excluded — Has no direct market value in most contexts.
feedback.Politicised: Excluded — Not part of political discourse.
feedback.Ritualised: Excluded — Not part of cultural ceremony per se.
feedback.Ethically Significant: Included — Human bones invoke ethical treatment standards in medicine, archaeology, and burial practices.

encoding_notes: This encoding interprets the human femur strictly as a biological object with structural function. 'Powered' is excluded as it does not consume energy. 'Ethically Significant' is included due to its role in medical, forensic, and cultural contexts.
